article:
Minimalistic Photography Portfolio

Description

A modern, fast, and highly customizable photography portfolio template.

Ideal for photographers who want to showcase their work through a sleek, performant, and professional website.

Key Features

  • Fully responsive design
  • Optimized image loading and handling
  • Easy to customize
  • Easy to organized gallery via a yaml file
  • Multiple collections support
  • Image zoom capabilities
  • Automatic deployment to GitHub pages

Built With

  • Typescript
  • Tailwind
  • Sharp
  • GLightbox

github.name: astro-photography-portfolio
github.description: AstroJS based photography portfolio site template
